imdb.title: Nana
imdb.plot: Two ostensibly opposite women, both named Nana, become roommates in Tokyo and grow inseparable. However, their relationship is jeopardized as the harsh realities of adult life take shape.

episodes.title: Junko's Room
episodes.plot: Junko Saotome, Nana Komatsu's school friend, alongside her boyfriend Kyôsuke Takakura and their friend, Nana Komatsu's boyfriend, Shôji Endô, are gathering to host a 'TV Special'. Together, the three of them will review the past events in the life of Nana Komatsu and Nana Ôsaki.

episodes.title: Junko's Room 2
episodes.plot: A recap episode airing between episodes 21 and 22.

episodes.title: Junko's Room 3
episodes.plot: A recap episode airing between episodes 36 and 37.

episodes.title: Prologue: Nana and NANA
episodes.plot: Nana Komatsu is moving to Tokyo to start a new life with her boyfriend--and as chance would have it, she is about to meet a woman the same age named Nana Osaki, with the two Nanas destined to share an apartment...

episodes.title: Love? Friendship? Nana and Shôji
episodes.plot: A look into the teenage years of Nana Komatsu in her home town: her friendship with schoolmate Junko Saotome, her faculty to easily "fall in love" with older men, and her troubled relationship with her first love. Also, how she meet her current boyfriend, Shôji.

episodes.title: Nana and Shôji, Love's Whereabouts
episodes.plot: Nana K. and Shoji have made a "declaration of friendship," but their growing relationship is strained when Shoji decides to move to Tokyo.

episodes.title: Nana's Love, NANA's Dream
episodes.plot: Nana O. is a musically talented loner who is about to have her world turned upside down as her guitarist boyfriend Ren ponders a change of scenery.

episodes.title: Ren's Dream, NANA's Thoughts
episodes.plot: Ren is committed to hitting the big time as a musician in Tokyo, but is Nana O. content to come along for the ride, or stake her own claim to fame?

episodes.title: Snowing in Tokyo! Nana and NANA
episodes.plot: A chance encounter on a train brings Nana K. and Nana O. together, and another chance meeting leads to them sharing the same apartment.

episodes.title: Yasu Appears! Room No. 707
episodes.plot: Worried about Nana K.'s decision to live with a stranger, her friends drop by to make sure everything's all right--and meet a skinhead lawyer and Nana O. dressed only in a towel!

episodes.title: Strawberry Glass and Lotus Flower
episodes.plot: Shopping for their new apartment brings the Nanas closer together, as Nana K. gushes about Ren's band Trapnest, which brings back bittersweet memories for Nana O.

episodes.title: Nobu Arrives in Tokyo! NANA's Song
episodes.plot: When one of Nana O.'s old bandmates drops in for a visit, an impromptu music session becomes Nana O.'s first unofficial Tokyo concert.

episodes.title: The Handsome Youth Shin Appears!
episodes.plot: Nana O.'s musical ambitions are coming together as she recruits bassist Shin. But while Nana K. happily becomes the band's first groupie, is she forgetting to devote time to Shoji?

episodes.title: Sachiko, Is This on Purpose?
episodes.plot: Short on cash and soon to be out of a job, Nana K. is down in the dumps--and unbeknownst to her, things might be getting a whole lot worse as Shoji is falling for his co-worker Sachiko...

episodes.title: Urgent Approach! Shôji and Sachiko
episodes.plot: Boosted by some money from her mother, Nana K. gains herself a "respectable" job with a publisher, while Shoji finds that it's not as easy to break up with Sachiko as he thought.

episodes.title: Sachiko's Tears, Shôji's Determination
episodes.plot: A surprise visit by Nana K. to Shoji's workplace results in an unwelcome surprise for Nana K. when she sees Shoji with Sachiko.

episodes.title: Family Restaurant of Shambles
episodes.plot: A surprise visit by Nana K. to Shoji's workplace results in an unwelcome surprise for Nana K. when she sees Shoji with Sachiko.

episodes.title: Blast, First Live
episodes.plot: It's the evening of Blast' debut concert in Tokyo, and Nana K. does her best to drum up support for the band--but will her thunder get stolen by an ultra-cute groupie?

episodes.title: Nana's Love Whereabouts
episodes.plot: Nana K. has tickets to see the hot band Trapnest, but is Nana O. strong enough to accompany her and face her old lover Ren, who is performing in the band?

episodes.title: Trapnest, Live
episodes.plot: A trip to Nana K.'s hometown turns into an eye-opening visit with Nana K.'s family for Nana O., and a chance to reunite with her old love Ren.

episodes.title: Hachi's Prayer, Nana's Thoughts
episodes.plot: The Trapnest show is in full swing, and Nana K. hopes that Ren will see Nana O. from the stage. Will her maneuverings bring Nana O. and Ren back together?

episodes.title: Nana's Prize
episodes.plot: Nana K. may have plotted to bring Nana O. and Ren back together, but that doesn't prepare her for an unexpected mahjong tournament at her apartment, and a chance to meet her idol Takumi from Trapnest!

episodes.title: Sudden Development! Hachi's Fate
episodes.plot: As Nana K. gets more involved with the intertwined personal histories of the bands Trapnest and Blast, she risks losing something important--her job!

episodes.title: Dream of Suite Room
episodes.plot: While Nana K falls prey to the charms of Takumi of Trapnest, Nana O discovers that someone else has feelings for her fickle roommate.

episodes.title: Wish of July 7th, Hachi's Love
episodes.plot: Nana K prepares a feast in anticipation of Takumi dropping by after their show, but Takumi's at the after-party, making a shocking admission in front of Nobu and Shin.

episodes.title: I Do Not Want to Pass Over to Anybody
episodes.plot: Nana O confesses her worries about Takumi's womanizing to Yasu. Nana K, happily oblivious, pursues her relationship with Takumi, while Nobo works up the courage to reveal his feelings.

episodes.title: Hachi's Confused Heart
episodes.plot: Blast is on the verge of getting a recording deal and prepare for a live show. Behind the scenes, Nana O decides to stay at Ren's for a while, leaving Nana K brokenhearted.

episodes.title: A Capricious and Selfish Man
episodes.plot: Nana K is torn between her affection for Nobu and her undeniable attraction to Takumi, but finds that Takumi's draw is irresistible, leaving Nobu feeling betrayed.

episodes.title: The Passing Hachi and Nana
episodes.plot: A producer invites Blast out to dinner after their live show, while Nana K prepares a feast at home, only to be let down and run straight to Takumi's arms.

episodes.title: Hachi's Desired Future
episodes.plot: Nana K wants someone to love for the rest of her life, and she begins to think it won't be Takumi. Then she and Nobu share a moment alone...

episodes.title: Hachi and Nobu, Urgent Approach
episodes.plot: Nana and Nobu fall in love under the stars, but the shadow of Takumi still lingers between them, unless Nana can make the final break.

episodes.title: The Problem of Expressing Love
episodes.plot: Everyone is happy about Nana K and Nobu dating, especially Nana O. But Takumi is not so happy when Nana's cell phone rejects his calls, and Ren sees trouble ahead.

episodes.title: Breakdown, Nana's Heart
episodes.plot: Nana O is worried about Nana K, Misato is worried about Blast's contract, and Nana K is worried about a possible pregnancy!

episodes.title: Hachi's Child, Pregnancy
episodes.plot: Misato and Nana O worry over Nana K. When Shin reveals details of his family's past, Nana O and Nana K launch into a discussion of motherhood.

episodes.title: Don't Separate the Joined Hands
episodes.plot: Takumi surprisingly steps up to take responsibility for Nana's pregnancy, but Nana O is devastated and Nobu heartbroken.

episodes.title: Hachi's Choice
episodes.plot: Reeling from the Nana K's news, Nana O runs to her usual source of comfort--Yasu. Nana K in the meantime runs to Junko and Kyosuke, and when she returns home, she finds Takumi waiting for her.

episodes.title: The Grass of the Split Strawberry
episodes.plot: Nana O is disgusted to find Takumi at the apartment, walking around like he owns the place, and the general unrest deepens when Takumi reveals his and Nana's engagement to the rest of Trapnest.

episodes.title: Reira's Loneliness
episodes.plot: A brokenhearted Reira has rushed to Yasu for comfort, sending the recording studio in an uproar at her disappearance.

episodes.title: Blast's New Song!!
episodes.plot: Nana O stays away from apt. 707, but unknown to her, Nana K has moved into a luxurious new apartment and is spending her days knitting for the baby.

episodes.title: Hachi, High-Class Housewife
episodes.plot: Takumi and Nana K are blissful in their new apartment, but Reira is torn apart by the engagement, prompting Shin to rush to her side.

episodes.title: The Trigger of Fate
episodes.plot: Nana O is ready at last to see Nana K again, but is turned away at their building as a stalker fan! Nana K is actually only steps away at a coffee shop with Shin, who tells her to stand by her decision.

episodes.title: Look, Hachiko
episodes.plot: Nana O and Ren suddenly find themselves in the spotlight when their relationship becomes fodder for the entertainment media. Everyone's on edge, including Takumi and Nana K, who have their first fight.

episodes.title: Blast, Debut!
episodes.plot: While Blast deals with the repercussions of the media attention, Nana K makes up with Takumi, only to discover he's going away--to London.

episodes.title: Blast Lodging Together
episodes.plot: Takumi returns from London and prepares to meet Nana's parents, while Ren ponders if he can ever love Nana O the way that Yasu does.

episodes.title: Nana: Sudden Fit
episodes.plot: Blast records at a training camp, while in Nana K's hometown, Takumi charms and is charmed by the Komatsu family.

episodes.title: Blast, Guerilla Live
episodes.plot: Nana O recovers from her collapse, and Blast's schedule becomes crammed. Nana relies on Yasu to handle the stress, but the image of Ren is always at the back of her mind.

episodes.title: Blast vs. Trapnest
episodes.plot: Blast and Trapnest prepare to appear on the same show together, giving Ren an opportunity to ambush Nana in her dressing room with a shocking proposal.

episodes.title: Blast's First TV Performance
episodes.plot: Nana K is overcome with fan fever when she sees Blast's live performance on TV. Hoping to reconnect with Nana O and apologize to Nobu, she texts Shin with an invitation to a fireworks show.

episodes.title: Reunion! Hachi and Shoji
episodes.plot: Yasu gets permission from their manager for everyone to attend the fireworks show. Disguised to protect themselves from ardent fans, the band members wait in apt. 707 for Nana K.

episodes.title: The Fireworks Display, Hachi and NANA
episodes.plot: With Nana K and Takumi's wedding two weeks away, both Nana K and Nobu are nervous about seeing each other, but Nana O is determined to bring them together at the fireworks show that the band is attending in disguise.
